thread.title: Best photos from the Folds of Honor QuikTrip 500 at Atlanta
thread.title_full: Best photos from the Folds of Honor QuikTrip 500 at Atlanta

title: Best photos from the Folds of Honor QuikTrip 500 at Atlanta
text:
Mar 5, 2017 at 4:48p ET 0Shares 
Check out the best photos from the Folds of Honor QuikTrip 500 at Atlanta Motor Speedway: Shanna Lockwood Shanna Lockwood-USA TODAY Sports Fans flock to the garage 
In the morning before the action gets going, fans head to the garage area to see crew members prep their favorite driver's car. Shanna Lockwood Shanna Lockwood-USA TODAY Sports Pre-race concert 
Josh Turner performs in the infield for fans a few hours before the race. Shanna Lockwood Shanna Lockwood-USA TODAY Sports Meeting of the minds 
In the morning driver's meeting, Dale Earnhardt Jr., Jimmie Johnson, and Chad Knaus chat with each other while they wait for the start of the meeting. Shanna Lockwood Shanna Lockwood-USA TODAY Sports Going to the grid 
The No. 11 Joe Gibbs Racing Toyota goes through pre-race inspection before taking the field. Shanna Lockwood Shanna Lockwood-USA TODAY Sports Ready to race 
Joey Logano straps into his No. 22 Team Penske Ford and gets ready to go racing for 500 miles at Atlanta. , LAT Images www.latphoto.co.uk Rusty Jarrett Green flag 
Kevin Harvick and Ryan Newman take the green flag to start the race. Getty Images Getty Images Harvick grabs the early lead 
Once Harvick took the lead early, he was the class of the field through the first two stages. Getty Images Getty Images Lap 13 tribute 
The fans held up small flags presented by Folds of Honor on Lap 13 to represent the 13 folds when an American flag is properly displayed. Shanna Lockwood Shanna Lockwood-USA TODAY Sports Stage 1 winner 
Harvick dominated the opening stage of the race and had a five-second lead at the end of it. Shanna Lockwood Shanna Lockwood-USA TODAY Sports Stage 2 winner 
Harvick continued his domination in the second stage of the race and cruised to another stage victory. Getty Images Getty Images
